page.title: 03Churches/High Lane & Norbury
page.content: We found out that the church still plays an important part in the life of both communities. Both churches are called after St.Thomas. {Norbury,Hazel {Grove}was built in 1834 and{High Lane in 1855. They both served fairly small villages. The church in{High Lane}was the only place of worship. Both churches were centres not only of worship, but also leisure.Today there are churches of all denominations in both villages and many people are associated with a large number of organisations connected with the churches eg.Cubs,Brownies Scouts, Guides ,C.L.B, W.I,Womens Union,Mens Groups etc. Norbury Church opened in 1985 a Narthex costing over Â£200,000. Many people may not go to church in present times, but the churches are still important.
